[Skullcrusher]() is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). Its default [alignment](/wiki/Alignment "Alignment") is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [club](/wiki/Club "Club"); in Hack'EM, it is made of [mineral](/wiki/Mineral "Mineral") instead of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood").

## Generation

A randomly generated club has a base 1⁄20 chance (5%) of being made into an artifact: in SLASH'EM, the artifact will always be Skullcrusher if it is not yet generated; in SlashTHEM, it has an equal probability of being made into Skullcrusher or [Petslayer](/index.php?title=Petslayer\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Petslayer (page does not exist)") if neither has been generated; and in Hack'EM, it has an equal probability of being made into Skullcrusher or [Keolewa](/wiki/Keolewa "Keolewa").

In all three variants, Skullcrusher is the first guaranteed [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for [Cavepeople](/wiki/Cavepeople "Cavepeople"), and lawful characters may receive it as a sacrifice gift.

## Description

In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, Skullcrusher has +3 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals +10 bonus damage against all monsters. In Hack'EM, this is changed to +1d3 to-hit and +1d10 damage against all monsters.

## Strategy

While not as overpowered as the [Bat from Hell](/wiki/Bat_from_Hell "Bat from Hell"), Skullcrusher is still a significant boon for Cavepeople in SLASH'EM: its bonuses against all monsters makes the early game a breeze, and remains viable well into and through the late game. In terms of damage, it is only slightly worse than [Excalibur](/wiki/Excalibur "Excalibur") or [Snickersnee](/wiki/Snickersnee "Snickersnee"), though it is superseded by the Bat from Hell as an artifact [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish").
